original_name: The Third: Aoi Hitomi no Shoujo
plot: Honoka, a desert-wandering jack-of-all-trades, must deal with the technology-oppressing group known as The Third, as well as her own inner feelings and struggles.
plot_en: Honoka, a desert-wandering jack-of-all-trades, must deal with the technology-oppressing group known as The Third, as well as her own inner feelings and struggles.
plot_es: Honoka, a desert-wandering jack-of-all-trades, must deal with the technology-oppressing group known as The Third, as well as her own inner feelings and struggles.
title: The Third: Aoi Hitomi no Shoujo
